issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Rotate device to landscape
3. Run Controls > Picker > Countdown picker

Actual Result:
Picker is not displayed correctly, see attached image

Expected Result:
To draw the picker correctly

Note:
Does not reproduce with iPhone 4 devices
fields.summary: iOs: Launching in landscape mode, picker is displayed wrong
fields.environment: Tested with ipod touch 4GT (4.1) Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (05/05/11 00:38 f8dfdf7...)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
